content.rendered:
Baba Education Consultancy is a group of young and enterprising entrepreneurs. Knowledge and Experience of professionals at Baba Education Consultancy since 2000 has brought a fine and excellent expertise services in the field of Higher Education, Education Consulting and Migration Services. Baba Education Consultancy is officially registered with ROC in Nepal and with ASIC in Australia. We are members & accreditation of ECAN, AECA, ISANA, Aussie Specialist, WSC (UK), Future Learn. Our director and team members are QEAC Certified and registered MARA Agent.

 

We are currently recruiting students from different parts of Nepal and Australia to Australian, Canadian & UK Education Providers. Our aim is not only to assist students to achieve degrees and provide migration services but also to provide best and efficient expert services with integrity and authenticity.

Baba Education Consultancy believes that we should support the markets by determining scope of generic consulting and providing an enhanced support mechanism to those students who are seeking right guidance, counselling and preparing them for the world of tomorrow’s world.

Recognizing the needs of International Students in Australia we have been providing education, migration and taxation services under the same roof. Our confidence in our abilities based on infrastructure and learning sources to support students who are seeking flying colors of rainbow on their wings.

We at Baba Education Consultancy are dedicated to serve individuals who need education and migration services in Australia.
